CustomField.description: AND(Do_Not_Call__c = false , Email_Opt_Out__c = false , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , Out_of_Business__c = false , OR(RecordType.Name ="Core Account Record Type",RecordType.Name = "MMS Account Record Type") , NOT(BEGINS(AccountNumber,'741')) , NOT(AdvancedPartnerClients__c) , NumberOfEmployees <50 , Employees__c < 50 , OR(ISBLANK(OpportunityTypes__c),NOT(CONTAINS(OpportunityTypes__c, "TAA"))) , OR(ISBLANK(SalesParent__c),SalesParent__r.NumberOfEmployees < 50) , NOT(CONTAINS(SensitivityList__c, "TAA")) )
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Restricted_Industry__c,'CRB'),false, AND(Do_Not_Call__c = false , Email_Opt_Out__c = false , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce')) , Out_of_Business__c = false , Benetrac_Indicator__c = false , OR(RecordType.Name ="Core Account Record Type",RecordType.Name = "MMS Account Record Type") , OR(NOT(ISBLANK(AccountNumber)),NOT(BEGINS(AccountNumber,'741'))) , AdvancedPartnerClients__c = false , NumberOfEmployees <50 , Employees__c < 50 , OR(ISBLANK(OpportunityTypes__c),NOT(CONTAINS(OpportunityTypes__c, "TAA"))) , OR(ISBLANK(SalesParent__c),SalesParent__r.NumberOfEmployees < 50) , OR(ISBLANK(SensitivityList__c),NOT(CONTAINS(SensitivityList__c, "TAA"))) , OR(ISBLANK(CadenceType__c ),NOT(CONTAINS( CadenceType__c ,"TAA"))) , ISPICKVAL(Time_and_Attendance__c,"") , First_Run_Date__c <= ADDMONTHS( TODAY() ,-2) ,(ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) ,NOT(CONTAINS(Owner.Job_Name__c , "District Sales Manager")) ,NOT(Owner.Sales_Division__c = "Strategic Accounts") ) )
CustomField.label: TAA Workable
